name: My light in the darkness
description:
Accompany Mugboi and Sneketti on their adventure to collect their favorite midnight snack; chocolate chip cookies! In this small idle game you control the character Mugboi, who in turn can control his fluffy friend sneketti via a lightbeam.

This game was created by us two students during a 2 month-module at zurich university of the arts. The goal was to create an atmospheric and relaxing game experience using 3D art, animation and sound. 

Reviews and critique are always appreciated :)
